title: Similar to Artcraft with initialling caps
content:
I can't remember if this is a font or if it was hand lettered. Any ideas? Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141030043525im_/http:/typophile.com/files/firey_3932.jpg)
author: phrostbyte64

comments.content:
It appears to be hand-drawn, and based on several sources.

The B resembles the one in this typeface:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/wiescherdesign/cacao/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141030043525/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/wiescherdesign/cacao/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/wiescherdesign/cacao/")

Most (but not all) of the rest of the letters resemble Bromwich:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/gatf/bromwich/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141030043525/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/gatf/bromwich/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/gatf/bromwich/")
